metadata.title: CVE-2023-1872 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux Kernel io_uring system can beexploited to achieve local privilege escalation. The io_file_get_fixedfunction lacks the presence of ctx->uring_lock which can lead to aUse-After-Free vulnerability due a race condition with fixed files gettingunregistered. We recommend upgrading past commitda24142b1ef9fd5d36b76e36bab328a5b27523e8.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
